function.name: create_file
function.description: Create a file with a specified name and content. This function generates a file based on the user s input, ensuring the content is saved in the desired location.

file_name.description: The name of the file to be created, including its extension (e.g., schema.graphql).

content.description: The content to write into the file. This could be plain text, code, or any other text format specified by the user.
